course_title: Applied Data Science & Decision Support Capstone II
class_notes: Permission Only - Program Approval to Take Courses Required.
course_description: In this capstone course, students work individually to apply the concepts and skills learned throughout the APHI curriculum to an applied data science topic.
prerequisites: APHI 520D and APHI 525D and APHI 527D and APHI 535D and APHI 550D and APHI 580D and BIOS 503D as prerequisites or special permission required to enroll.

Su 8:30am-11:30am in Grace Crum Rollins P41
